text: function changeObject(x) { x = {member:"bar"}; alert("in changeObject: " + x.member); } function changeMember(x) { x.member = “"bar”; alert("in changelember: " + x.member); } var x = {member:"foo"}; alert("before changeObject: " + x.member); changeObject (x); alert("after changeObject: ™ + x.member); /* change did not persist */ alert("before changeMember: " + x.member); changeMember (x) ; alert("after changeMember: " + x.member); /* change persists */
